biotools.summary: The Automatic Mycorrhiza Finder (AMFinder) allows for automatic computer vision-based identification and quantification of AM fungal colonisation and intraradical hyphal structures on ink-stained root images using convolutional neural networks.

bioschemas.name: AMFinder
bioschemas.summary: The Automatic Mycorrhiza Finder (AMFinder) allows for automatic computer vision-based identification and quantification of AM fungal colonisation and intraradical hyphal structures on ink-stained root images using convolutional neural networks.
